name: Mini Golf: Desert Edition 2016 - Play golf holes in classic sand environment by BULKY SPORTS
name_original: Mini Golf: Desert Edition 2016 - Play golf holes in classic sand environment by BULKY SPORTS
description:
You really think deserts are all covered with sands, they are only waste and barren lands???

Not anymore, we bring you the most exciting mini golf game with exciting new holes in desert environment. There is a very beautiful village right in the middle of thick and dry desert, enjoy the beautiful golf game there.

Three Episodes
Thirty six holes...
Each hole brings you a super new mind teaser. Use your full potential and beat them. Collect the diamonds throughout the level, gather virtual currency and use them in beating holes.

Oh... wait... Bored of playing alone? you can bring in your facebook friends too, Just login through your facebook account, invite your friends to play and see how they are doing as compared to you.

Feedback:
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at ask.bulkysports@gmail.com

ENJOY.....
